individual_metadata.synopsis: A githyanki teenager standing near a portrait of Vlaakith.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: CRE_Main_A oe debugbook goto 1345 0 -795OR teleport S_CRE_PortraitKidspeak with Youth Vis'kiir

0.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
0.text: Oh Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai, I think it's starting to come off!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (means "for the honour of Vlaakith")NodeContext: Slight relief through the extreme panic

1.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
1.context: NodeContext: Exasperated (and genuinely a little confused as to why there's blood here)

2.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
2.text: No, no, no - the Inquisitor will have our necks for this!
2.context: NodeContext: Panicked at the vandalized portrait

3.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
3.text: Oh Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai, it has to come off!
3.context: InternalNodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (means "for the honour of Vlaakith")NodeContext: Extremely panicky

4.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
4.text: You did this! The Inquisitor is going to gut us one by one and it's all your fault!
4.context: InternalNodeContext: SHKA-keth (means "asshole")NodeContext: Panicked/angry at the player

5.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
5.text: Look, I don't have time to talk to you, istik - this place isn't going to clean itself.

6.speaker: Youth Vis'kiir
6.text: Was cleaning duty this awful at your crèche?
6.context: NodeContext: Clearly weary of his cleaning duties/seeking sympathy from a fellow gith (the player)
